alert.note: Alert for Imperial (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 14 at 2:42PM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...AMBER Alert... The following message is transmitted at the request of CA California Highway Patrol. AN AMBER ALERT IS BEING ISSUED BY THE CALIFORNIA HIGHWAY PATROL ON BEHALF OF THE FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION. ON DECEMBER 10... 2023... RAINE GONZALES WAS ABDUCTED FROM BRAWLEY... CALIFORNIA. GONZALES IS A 13 YEAR OLD HISPANIC FEMALE... STANDING 5 FEET 9 INCHES TALL... WEIGHING 115 POUNDS... WITH BROWN HAIR AND BROWN EYES. GONZALES IS BELIEVED TO BE WEARING GRAY SWEATPANTS... A BLACK SHIRT... WHITE SHOES... AND MAY BE CARRYING A DARK COLORED JACKET AND BACKPACK. THE SUSPECT... LORENZO GUERRERO... IS A 44 YEAR OLD HISPANIC MALE... STANDING 5 FEET 7 INCHES TALL... WEIGHING 180 POUNDS... BALD... WITH BLACK EYES. LORENZO GUERRERO IS BELIEVED TO BE WEARING JEANS... A WHITE BASEBALL JERSEY WITH BLUE SHOULDERS AND THE NUMBER 44... A HAT... AND WHITE SHOES. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN DRIVING A 2007 SILVER MERCEDES C230... WITH CALIFORNIA LICENSE PLATE NUMBER 5 Z F S 1 5 8. IF SEEN CALL 9 1 1
